'''Captain Gold-Fin Chiara''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Captain Gold-Fin Chiara is a member of the Council of Captains, the ruling body of the [Principi sen Patrena](/principiSenPatrena/).

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [Honor Among Thieves](/honorAmongThieves/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Honor Among Thieves](/honorAmongThieves/): The captain is among those who cast the votes against [Captain Aeldys](/captainAeldys/).
